00010 #define SAFE_DELETE(x) if(x) { delete x; x = NULL; }

00012 CConfirmMenu::CConfirmMenu(const std::string &question, bool &to_be_confirmed, Uint8 dlg_theme) :
00013 CBaseMenu(dlg_theme),
00014 m_question(question),
00015 m_to_be_confirmed(to_be_confirmed)
00016 {
00017  mp_Dialog = new CDialog(22, 5, 'l',m_dlg_theme);
00018 
00019  std::string text;
00020 
00021  for( size_t c=0 ; c<(21-m_question.size())/2 ; c++ )
00022   text += " ";
00023  text += m_question;
00024  for( size_t c=0 ; c<(21-m_question.size())/2 ; c++ )
00025   text += " ";
00026 
00027  if(text.size() >= 21)
00028   text.erase(text.begin()+20,text.end());
00029 
00030  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_TEXT, 1, 1, text);
00031  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 1, 3, "Yes");
00032  mp_Dialog->addObject(DLG_OBJ_OPTION_TEXT, 15, 3, "No");
00033 }
00034 
00035 void CConfirmMenu::processSpecific()
00036 {
00037  if( m_selection != NO_SELECTION )
00038  {
00039   m_to_be_confirmed = (m_selection == 1) ? true : false;
00040   m_mustclose = true;
00041  }
00042 }
00043 
00044 CConfirmMenu::~CConfirmMenu()
00045 {
00046  SAFE_DELETE(mp_Dialog);
00047 }
